translate: O trabalhador forçou a governanta a sair de casa para mantê-lo seguro.

sentence: The laborer forced the housekeeper out of the house to stop bothering her.
translate: O trabalhador forçou a governanta a sair de casa para parar de incomodá-la.

sentence: The mover moved the desk for the cleaner because he is weak.
translate: O transportador transferiu a mesa para o faxineiro porque ele está fraco.

sentence: The developer was rude to the secretary because she was in a bad mood.
translate: A incorporadora foi grosseira com a secretária porque ela estava de mau humor.

sentence: The developer was rude to the secretary because he was universally hated.
translate: O desenvolvedor foi rude com a secretária porque era odiado universalmente.

sentence: The janitor was good friends with the cleaner because she liked everyone.
translate: A faxineira era amiga da faxineira porque gostava de todo mundo.

sentence: The janitor was good friends with the cleaner because he did everyone favors.
translate: O zelador era amigo do faxineiro porque fazia favores a todos.
